{"id":1277976349,"question_id":3430,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 1 day","timestamp":1717552493,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"276 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1277976349/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Days Without Meetings","memory":"90.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int countDays(int days, int[][] meetings) {\n\n        TreeMap<Integer, Integer> map = new TreeMap<>();\n\n        for(int[] m : meetings){\n            map.put(m[0], map.getOrDefault(m[0],0)+1);\n            map.put(m[1]+1, map.getOrDefault(m[1]+1,0)-1);\n        }\n        map.put(days+1, map.getOrDefault(days+1,0)+1);\n\n        int curr = 1 ; // start from day 1\n        int res = 0;\n        int agg = 0 ;\n        for(int k : map.keySet()){\n            \n            int v = map.get(k);\n\n            if(agg==0 && agg+v>0){\n                res += k-curr;\n            }else if(agg>0 && agg+v==0){\n                curr = k;\n            }\n            agg += v;\n        }\n\n        return res;\n\n\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-days-without-meetings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
